usage.cn: 有时候，我们被迫走选择的路，直到有一天才发现应该去寻找自己的心声。——《曼哈顿女佣2》
usage.eng: Sometimes we're forced in directions till we ought to find our sounds.

usage.cn: 生活告诉我们，爱不在于朝夕相伴，而应能风雨同舟
usage.eng: life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.
